participant_1.background:
I am a unique individual who is comfortable in my own skin.
i ve never been to the beach.
I learn new things to keep my mind sharp.
I'm a pretty peaceful person, but I can hold my own if I need to.
I'm always trying to find new ways to make our home feel more like our own.

participant_2.background:
I like to enjoy my meals, so I don't go to fast food restaurants very often.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.
I have a lot of fond memories of playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
i am a full time mom.
i have been married eight years.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well thanks! How about yourself?
I am doing well too! I am excited to be spending time with my family this weekend. We are going to the beach!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never been to the beach.
You should go sometime! It is a great place to relax and have fun.
I will have to try it sometime! What do you like to do at the beach?
I like to swim, sunbathe, and play in the sand. I also love to build sandcastles!
Those sound like fun activities! I am not very good at building sandcastles.
Don't worry! I am not very good at it either. We can practice together!
That would be fun! I am looking forward to meeting your family.
I know they are looking forward to meeting you too!
